infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Nizam's Kathi Kabab use your camera for verification of specific user who pick-up order
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Nizam's Kathi Kabab app uses customers location, because when the customer is in a certain area of the store, the app will notify them about a special discounted offer.

infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Nizam's Kathi Kabab app uses customers location, because when the customer is in a certain area of the store, the app will notify them about a special discounted offer.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This app collect data that can be used for the special discounted offer to get your attention
